channel.title: [Grades][Poll] What do you do when you get bad grades?
channel.description: Hey , What do you do when you bring home grades? Lol, i was just thinking of last week. [shadow=red,left][b]Story[/b][/shadow] I came home with a progress report (a mid-term grade). I was trying to avoid my parents by faking i was a sleep :P. When i fakely woke up :rolleyes:, i went into the other room where my parents were. I was like :| , so my mom is like "hey bryan, didn't you get your progress report today?" I was thinking to my self "What the fuck!!!" lol , so i said "yes i did" . i was pulling it out my pocket when my father says "what are you hiding it?" im like "no... *laughing* :P" lol. my mom is like "4+!" (a d+, my worste grade ever on a mid term or grades. except quizes ;D. well anyways , i told my mom a lame excuse and they never really talked about it again. "Thank God!" :D EDIT: Tell your stories here , i would love to here them :D

item.title: [Grades][Poll] What do you do when you get bad grades?

item.description:
@pko wrote:

i hate 3.9 (rounded)

im a nerdy sophmore. i handle sports,grades, and relationships, and have a great reputation aswell. Woohoo.

wasnt like this 2 years ago…always had good grades and stuff now things have changed allot

item.source: [Grades][Poll] What do you do when you get bad grades?

item.title: [Grades][Poll] What do you do when you get bad grades?
item.dc:creator: @james james
item.description:
@james wrote:

[quote=“leader, post:15, topic:21536”]I have a 4.6 GPA is school. Lately I have failed a test though, because I was studying for the AP European History test and didn’t study for the chemistry and Spanish tests that I had on the same day. Well, I got a 61% on the chemistry test :(, but luckily my grade just dropped down to a 95% in the class :). Today, we had to take the math benchmark test and I wasn’t feeling good so I didn’t answer all the questions. It sucks if I got lower than a A on that, it will make my grade go down as tests are 65% of our grade in that class.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 03, 2006, 11:29:09 PM[/size][hr][quote author=Zach1188 link=topic=32798.msg398060#msg398060 date=1162642867]
Well, my mom gets mad, I tell her to shut up and make me some dinner, and it’s done.

My dad never finds out.
[/quote]

I would never tell my mom to shut up, she would get so mad and tell my dad. My dad would then ground me from the computer for a long time, and start hitting me for being so rude.

Since I’m home schooled and don’t do tests, if I was you I’d suggest tell your parents. From there it’s up to you if you continue to go down hill, go want to get back on the right road.

I’m sure you can ask a teacher/your parents for extra schooling. Else you can always study online in your spare time.

I wish I was home schooled.[/quote]

you get hit by your dad…

Read full topic

My dad never finds out.[/quote]

I would never tell my mom to shut up, she would get so mad and tell my dad. My dad would then ground me from the computer for a long time, and start hitting me for being so rude.

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:13, topic:21536”]Since I’m home schooled and don’t do tests, if I was you I’d suggest tell your parents. From there it’s up to you if you continue to go down hill, go want to get back on the right road.

I’m sure you can ask a teacher/your parents for extra schooling. Else you can always study online in your spare time.[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

googlethis:

I just eat them.

Only I can do that…

But me, I recently got this thing where my bitch-ass science teacher said my behavior was “Very Disruptive” and I was all like, “LOL!” So, I forged my mom’s signature, which looked nothing like my mom’s but my Science teacher was n33b enough to believe it.

So, yeah, I forge…
